whow?! :)

Some of these songs are brilliant, then again, if you were looking for "songs" simply because you thought Miami Vice would sport something you can play at your average party, you can skip downloading this soundtrack.

'Mogwai - Auto rock' is an elegant piece,
Timbaland sampled "Felix The Housecat" and one of India Arie's best songs is "Ready for Love".
